data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

resultPayload.note: Bookings reviewed and one booking progressed.
External channel integration configured and persisted through API.

data.instruction: Configure one external integration/channel and verify sync state + external id linkage is persisted.
data.expectedResult: Connector installation/configuration and sync status are queryable for operational debugging.

resultPayload.note: External channel integration configured and persisted through API.
Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

resultPayload.note: Repeated unauthorized hold attempts were blocked (403).

requestBody.title: Create and publish offer version API Trace

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Attempt unauthorized cross-biz visibility/mutation in marketplace/enterprise scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Unauthorized access is denied and no sensitive tenant data leaks across business boundaries.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.
